alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 04 at 11:11AM AKDT until June 05 at 9:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM AKDT MONDAY FOR HOT DRY AND WINDY CONDITIONS FOR THE COPPER RIVER BASIN... The National Weather Service in Anchorage has issued a Red Flag Warning FOR HOT DRY AND WINDY CONDITIONS, which is in effect from noon to 9 PM AKDT Monday. * Winds... Generally southeast 10 to 15 mph. Along the Copper River Valley, southeast 15 to 20 mph with gusts 25 to 35 mph, especially after 1500. * Timing...1200 to 2100 Monday. * Relative Humidity...As low as 18 percent along the Copper River Valley. * Temperatures...Low to mid 70s below 2900 feet. * Location...Areas below 2900 feet. * Impacts...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires will be possible.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are imminent or occurring now, or will shortly. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them to the public.
